xuiMessage
directive in module xui

Description

XUI wrapper for displaying different kind of messages. Message content can be text or any valid HTML code.

Usage

as element:
<xui-message
       name="{string}"
       type="{string}"
       allow-dismiss="{boolean}"
       on-dismiss="{function}">
</xui-message>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
namestring

Name of the element.

typestring

Message type. Values: 'ok', 'success', 'error', 'info', 'hint', 'warning', or 'critical'.

allow-dismissboolean

Set to true if the message can be dismissed by the user.

on-dismissfunction

()=>boolean Callback function that is executed when the user has asked to dismiss the message.

Example
